question: What are my options from Virginia's Insurance Marketplace if I don't qualify for disability benefits?
text:
What are my options from Virginia's Insurance Marketplace if I don't qualify for disability benefits?
          
        
If you have a disability, don't qualify for disability benefits, and need health coverage, you can apply for coverage on Virginia's Insurance Marketplace.
If you don't qualify for Medicaid based on your disability, you have 2 more options for health coverage through Virginia's Insurance Marketplace:

You may qualify for Medicaid based on your income and family size.

You may qualify to enroll in a health plan through Virginia's Insurance Marketplace with
premium tax credits
and other savings that make coverage more affordable. This will depend on your household size and income.

Important:
Insurers offering coverage through Virginia's Insurance Marketplace can't deny coverage or charge you more based on your answers to questions about your disability.
